item.title: Basic Exploration of WHO Tuberculosis Data
item.dc:creator: Kyle Belanger
item.description: Today I am going to dive into some real life data from the World Health Organization (WHO), exploring new and relapse cases of Tuberculosis. I clean up the data, and then make a few graphs to explore different variables.
